name: DuckPath!
description:
Help the little ducklings get to their mom. Collect ducks one by one and lead them through a variety of obstacles. Save as many ducks as you can. It is very simple to play but you need to be careful because there can be many unexpected dangers in the river.

Collect baby ducks, lead them, save them, and watch them interact with each other. Hey, your fluffy friends are waiting for you - SO JOIN NOW!

Features:
- Unique gameplay: swap to lead ducks down the river avoiding obstacles
- Many interesting and fun levels
- Explore an exciting natural world with amusing 3D ducklings
- Baby ducks will thank you wholeheartedly when they get to mom
- Super fun, easy and addictive.

DuckPath! is the perfect thing to sink your spare time into when you want something fun and casual.

Save ducks, keep this world clean and green!
